sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Bounty hunters, assassins, and other criminals often have a need to conceal weapons on their bodies to sneak them past guards or get close to a target without arousing alarm. A shadowsheath utilizes optical camouflage technology, but rather than conceal an entire body, its smaller projector is specifically designed to conceal a single weapon when kept in a holster or sheath. This attachment may be attached to any weapon with an encumbrance of 2 or less. Models Include: Merr-Sonn Shadowsheath WCS. Base Modifiers: Increase the difficulty of any checks made to detect the sheath or the weapon it holds by two. Modification Options: None.</description> <encumbrance/> <hard_points/> <hp_required>1</hp_required> <name>Shadowsheath</name> <number>GEAR0001176</number> <price>1500</price> <range/> <rarity>5</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-19 05:49:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>351b04ce2fe42c90e0f497eef699b6d6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-19 05:49:12</sys_updated_on> <type>mod</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
